Training

  • To gain swipe access into the Brandeis MakerLab, we ask that you attend one of our weekly training workshops in 3D Printing, 3D Scanning, or Embeded Systems and Soldering.
  • Intro to 3D printing workshops are offered every Friday from 10am-12pm.
  • Intro to 3D scanning workshops are offered Thursdays from 3pm-5pm.
  • Soldering trainings are offered Monday mornings afternoons from 2pm-4pm.
  • To attend a trainings, email makerlab@brandeis.edu atleast 24 hours before the training begins to reserve a spot. Please show up on time as we need the full 2 hours to cover all the topics! If you can't make any of the specified training times, email us and we'll schedule something that works for you.
Contact the MakerLab
